guide.conclusion: All you need is sandpaper or a file to smooth the cut end of the spoke, a marker pen to mark on it and pliers to bend it. Simple!

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Bike spokes is useful part for small project. This holder was made by single 280mm spokes.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Bike spokes is useful part for small project. This holder was made by single 280mm spokes.

Relevant parts
  • Bike spoke
Tools
  • Pliers
  • Ruler
  • Sandpaper

lines.text: Here is the completed holder with a 7" MID resting in it.front view and rear view.
lines.text_raw: Here is the completed holder with a 7" MID resting in it.front view and rear view.

lines.text: Use a mark pen to mark on the spoke where you want your bends to be. Bend the spoke with pliers. Smooth the cut end with sandpaper to avoid any scratch issue.
lines.text_raw: Use a mark pen to mark on the spoke where you want your bends to be. Bend the spoke with pliers. Smooth the cut end with sandpaper to avoid any scratch issue.

lines.text: And the holder is all right for any small device.
lines.text_raw: And the holder is all right for any small device.

guide.summary: Make a holder for small elec-devices.
guide.title: MID Holder
